dalserver.conf

Class XMLConfiguredKeywordFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.KeywordFactory
      • dalserver.conf.XMLConfiguredKeywordFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SlapKeywordFactory

    public class XMLConfiguredKeywordFactory
extends KeywordFactory
    a general purpose KeywordFactory that can be configured by an XML file
